name: The Coconut Chronicle
description:
This is a small christmas action adventure rpg made with lots of love to spread some Christmas vibes :).

Controls are in the game, you should be able to figure everything out.

This is our first game, so if there are any bugs, please report them to us.  A donation would also be appreciated so that we can build a small budget for future games ;).  Also please excuse any bad english as it's not our first language.
